WorkItem.Description:
While loading ANY class characters from EU armory all gems currently inserted are placed not on right sockets. I don't know, may be that persist for Russian realms only... I can't check that. For example, metagems are shown as inserted on different colored sockets (not on it's own socket), any colored gems are shown as inserted in ABSENT sockets in different current items e.t.c. 
I'm using Rawr v4.0.20b.
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] Not correctly importing gems from eu.battle.net armory (Russian Realms)

Comments.Message: I cannot reproduce this with the characters I usually load from EU. Can you please provide your armory link so we can try to repro?
I download new version of RAWR 4.1.0 right now  and all work fine in that release. Thank You for attention and sorry :)
